boardgame.name: Dschunke
Jonque
Junk
boardgame.description: Asia's floating markets are pulsating with life. Junks are packed tightly together, bursting with loads of exotic goods from every part of the world. Merchants and their trainees move from boat to boat across narrow wooden foot-bridges, buying for the big markets in the city. In order to make the best deals is it important to be at right Junk at the right time. Skillful coordination of your actions is vital, if you want to become one of Asia's most respected Trade dealers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2002 Deutscher Spiele Preis Best Family/Adult Game 3rd Place
2002 Japan Boardgame Prize Best Advanced Game Nominee
2003 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGTG 58 - May 17, 2006 - SR: Ticket to Ride: Märklin, Buy Low Sell High, Dschunke and Feedback

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
